languages.text: "Эй, если вы — разумные сущности, а не фантомы, предлагаю отступить без боя. Я приш{mf|ел|ла} сюда не за вашими жизнями".
"If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
languages.original_text: "Эй, если вы — разумные сущности, а не фантомы, предлагаю отступить без боя. Я приш{mf|ел|ла} сюда не за вашими жизнями".

traits.locale_text: "Hey, if you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hey, if you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hey, if you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I didn't come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Hey, if you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I didn't come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « Si vous êtes des créatures intelligentes et non de vulgaires fantômes, je vous conseille de tourner les talons sans vous battre. Je ne suis pas là pour prendre vos vies. »
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous êtes des créatures intelligentes et pas de vulgaires fantômes, je vous conseille de tourner les talons sans vous battre. Je ne suis pas là pour prendre vos vies. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Si sois seres inteligentes y no meras ilusiones, os recomiendo que retrocedáis sin luchar. No he venido a cobrarme vuestras vidas».
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."

traits.locale_text: «Oye, si sois seres inteligentes y no meras ilusiones, os recomiendo que retrocedáis sin luchar. No he venido a cobrarme vuestras vidas».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “如果你们是有知觉的生物，不仅仅只是幻象，那我建议你们就此让步，不要与我们开战。我们不是来杀你们的。”
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."

traits.locale_text: “嘿，如果你们是有知觉的生物，不仅仅只是幻象，那我建议你们就此让步，不要与我们开战。我们不是来杀你们的。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「もし、お前たちが感覚を持つ生き物で、単なるアイドロンではないのなら、戦わずに引き下がることを勧める。私はお前たちの命を奪いに来たのではない」
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."

traits.locale_text: 「もし、お前たちが感覚を持つ生き物で、単なるアイドロンではないのなら、戦わずに引き下がることを勧める。私はお前たちの命を奪いに来たのではない」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr intelligente Kreaturen seid und keine bloßen Eidolons, dann solltet Ihr Euch kampflos ergeben. Ich bin nicht gekommen, um Euch das Leben zu nehmen."
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."

traits.locale_text: "Hey, wenn Ihr intelligente Kreaturen seid und keine bloßen Eidolons, dann solltet Ihr Euch kampflos ergeben. Ich bin nicht gekommen, um Eure Leben zu fordern."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Siz bilinçli varlıklarsanız ve hayalî değilseniz dövüşmeden geri çekilmenizi öneririm. Canınızı almaya gelmedim."
languages.original_text: "If you are sentient creatures and not mere eidolons, I suggest you back down without a fight. I did not come here to claim your lives."
